=Sources of well-known controlled value IRIs (draft)=

*Date:* (Created) 13 November 2013; (Last modified) 13 November 2013

*Status:* Not part of any standard ([http://www.tdwg.org/fileadmin/tdwg_std_drafts/tdwg_standards_documentation_specification.html#a_3 Type 3] document); intended to complement the RDF Guide of the Darwin Core Standard ([http://www.tdwg.org/standards/450/])

*Permanent URL:* http://

*TDWG Task Group:* [http://code.google.com/p/tdwg-rdf/ TDWG RDF/OWL Task Group]

*Contributors:* [mailto:steve.baskauf@vanderbilt.edu?subject=RDFguide Steve Baskauf] (TDWG RDF/OWL Task Group)

*Abstract:* This document lists sources of well-known IRIs that are recommended to be used as controlled values for object properties that are part of the Darwin Core standard.
